reviews.review_msg: Outstanding class, outstanding prof. I took his interdisciplinary course last semester and the stuff I learned in it still rings in my ears. Our school is interdisciplinary and the opportunity to work with artists in other disciplines was totally rad! I'd do it again in a heartbeat. I hear that DMac is retiring.  A huge loss to the school.

Professor MacIntyre was a great surprise as a teacher. It was an interdisciplinary class and he knew all about each discipline and the way work was approached by creators in each discipline. By the end of the semester, I realized what an amazing journey he'd taken us on!! All of us (about 30 in the class) had learned a lot about creativity and art!
never hated a prof so much in my life

I enjoyed this class a lot! I've never worked with other disciplines before and I did three projects with artists from other disciplines in this class. It was a gas! David was a great prof! Fun, focused and he knows his stuff.
Love this Prof! Took his course because I was interested and I learned an enormous amount. He's insightful, careful and thoughtful. Really appreciated his humour. I'm taking the next level, for sure!
